privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you visit or interact with our website.
privacy.section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.section1.body: We may collect information such as your name, email address, phone number, and IP address when you register, contact us, or interact with the site. We may also collect usage data via cookies and analytics tools.
privacy.section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.section2.body: Your data helps us personalize content, communicate with you, provide services, and improve our platform. We may also use it for analytics and marketing purposes.
privacy.section3.title: 3. Sharing Information
privacy.section3.body: We do not sell your data. We may share it with trusted partners (e.g., analytics or cloud services) who help us operate our services.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Your Rights
privacy.section4.body: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time by contacting us. We respect your privacy rights.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Cookies
privacy.section5.body: We use cookies to understand how users interact with our website and to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Age Restrictions
privacy.section6.body: Our services are intended for users aged 13 and above. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13.
privacy.section7.title: 7. Contact Us
privacy.contact_text: For questions about this policy, email us at
